name: Chevy
description: The 2018 Chevrolet Camaro is a muscle car that offers a wide range of engines, including a V6 and a V8, and a choice of two transmissions. The Camaro is available as a coupe or convertible, and it's one of the few cars in its class that can be had with a manual transmission. The Camaro's interior is comfortable and spacious, and it offers a wide range of technology features. The 2018 Camaro is a great choice for those who want a muscle car with a modern twist.

features.name: Bluetooth
features.description: Bluetooth is a wireless technology standard for exchanging data over short distances (using short-wavelength UHF radio waves in the ISM band from 2.4 to 2.485 GHz) from fixed and mobile devices, creating personal area networks (PANs) with high levels of security.

features.name: Heated Seats
features.description: Heated seats are a feature in automobiles that provide warmth to the driver and passengers. The seats are heated by electric heating elements, which are embedded in the seat cushion and backrest.

features.name: Leather Seats
features.description: Leather seats are seats covered with leather. Leather is a durable and flexible material created by tanning animal rawhide and skin, often cattle hide. It can be produced at manufacturing scales ranging from artisan to modern industrial scale.

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Navigation is the process of monitoring and controlling the movement of a craft or vehicle from one place to another. The field of navigation includes four general categories: land navigation, marine navigation, aeronautical navigation, and space navigation.
